goal.ch:
(1) This course introduces students to various types of mathematical analysis commonly needed in scientific computing. 

(2) The subject of numerical analysis is treated from a mathematical point of view, offering a complete analysis of methods for scientific computing with appropriate motivations and careful proofs.
goal.en:
(1) This course introduces students to various types of mathematical analysis commonly needed in scientific computing. 

(2) The subject of numerical analysis is treated from a mathematical point of view, offering a complete analysis of methods for scientific computing with appropriate motivations and careful proofs.

outline.ch:
Prerequisites: Advanced Numerical Analysis I (MA8019) and some knowledge of the software package MATLAB
This course will cover the following topics:
(1) Eigenvalue problems (continued)
(2) Interpolation and approximation
(3) Differentiation and integration
(4) Numerical ordinary differential equations
(5) Numerical partial differential equations
Course transparency sets in PDF are available at
http://www.math.ncu.edu.tw/~syyang/
outline.en:
Prerequisites: Advanced Numerical Analysis I (MA8019) and some knowledge of the software package MATLAB
This course will cover the following topics:

Course transparency sets in PDF are available at

textbook.ch: David Kincaid and Ward Cheney, Numerical Analysis: Mathematics of Scientific Computing, Third Edition, 2002, Brooks/Cole.
textbook.en: David Kincaid and Ward Cheney, Numerical Analysis: Mathematics of Scientific Computing, Third Edition, 2002, Brooks/Cole.

flexDiscription.ch: 期末考試安排在第 17 週，期末作業和個人討論安排在第17-18週。
flexDiscription.en: The final exam is scheduled for week 17, and final assignments and individual discussions are designed for weeks 17-18.

stus.department: 數學系(計算與資料科學組)
